findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.

findings.title: ST - Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to halt or pause transactions.

findings.title: OCTD - Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the capability to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: OTUT - Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner can transfer user's tokens.

findings.title: ELFM - Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: Contract owner has limited ability to increase fees, capped at 25%

findings.title: ULTW - Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner is restricted from increasing the amount of liquidity taken by the developer's wallet beyond a reasonable percentage.

findings.title: MT - Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: Contract Owner lacks the ability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to blacklist specific wallets from selling tokens.
